channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large amounts of food waste outside 41 narford, 29th October
item.description:
Residents have left a large amount of waste outside 41 Narford Road including incorrectly disposed of food waste.

item.title: Drains need clearing of leaves, 29th October
item.description:
All the drains in the section of Westmoreland from the traffic lights at Barnfield Wood Road to Cumberland Road need to be cleared of leaf litter as this is causing large puddles to build up and flood the road and pavements. This needs to be done weekly in the autumn.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Westmoreland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering/ Fly tipping, 29th October
item.description:
People always use this area to dump their household rubbish. Also, The cleaners never clean this area and it is always left to look like a mess. Some days the rubbish does not get collected from especially these bins when everyones else's bins are emptied.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Napier Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle parked here without permit, carrying a SORN Vehicle, 29th October
item.description:
No valid MOT (expired 2022) and no CPZ parking permit. Itâ€™s now carrying a vehicle declared SORN, The owner moves it occasionally a few meters, which is illegal as it has no MOT. Despite this, traffic wardens seem to intentionally avoid issuing PCNs to it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Craven Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
